item.title: About
item.description: We are very open to input and problem reports on the LiteGapps project You can contact us Telegram

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: To contact all input and problems, contact me Telegram

item.title: Cookie policy
item.description: Cookie Policy This is the Cookie Policy, accessible from https://litegapps.github.io/. What Are Cookies As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it, and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored however this may downgrade or ‘break’ certain elements of the site’s functionality.

item.title: Cookie policy
item.description: Terms Of Service The information on this page was last updated on july 23, 2023. Before using the https://litegapps.github.io website (the “Service”) owned by LiteGapps (“us”, “we”, or “our”), please read these Terms of Service (“Terms”, “Terms of Service”). Acceptance and compliance with these Terms are required for access to and use of the Service. All visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service are bound by these Terms.

item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: The information provided by litegapps (“we,” “us” or “our”) on https://litegapps.github.io (the “Site”) is for general informational purposes only. All information on the Site is provided in good faith, however we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability or completeness of any information on the Site. Under no circumstance shall we have any liability to you for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of the site or reliance on any information provided on the site.

item.title: Documentation
item.description: This page contains complete documents, please follow the steps and also notes so as not to use LitegApps incorrectly. Install Systemless Install ROM Install magisk in twrp Open Magisk Manager Install LiteGapps Reboot Non systemless Wiped /data Reboot recovery Install ROM Install litegapps reboot system How To Fix Contact Not Sync To overcome this, you can give contact permission in the Google Play Services settings.

item.title: legal
item.description: We do not collect any information!

item.title: Privacy And Policy
item.description: What I Collect, How i use and Changes Third party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads and analyze traffic based on a user’s prior visits to this website. Google’s use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to this website users based on their visit. Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings. The information we gather is used to offer, maintain, and secure our users’ services.
